Name: Spell Cast
About the game: Time survival game with roguelite elements. There's no place where to hide, all you can do is try to survive and get as much gem as possible for the next survivor, before Death inevitably puts an end to your struggles. Play with your friends - max 10 player Play with different characters Destroy your enemies, defend yourself. Use experiences to gain new abilities Combine abilities Get tons of rewards by killing bosses
